trans-unit.source: android:descendantFocusability="beforeDescendants" seems to be the default (integer value is 0). It works just by adding android:focusableInTouchMode="true".
trans-unit.target: android:descendantFocusability="beforeDescendants" 似乎是默认设置（整数值为0）。 只需添加 android:focusableInTouchMode="true" 。

trans-unit.source: android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" - always hide it when entering the activity.
trans-unit.target: android:windowSoftInputMode="stateHidden" -进入活动时始终将其隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Good comment from Guillaume Perrot:
trans-unit.target: Guillaume Perrot的 良好评价 ：

trans-unit.source: and finally, in onResume()
trans-unit.target: 最后，在onResume（）中

trans-unit.source: in onCreate()
trans-unit.target: 在onCreate（）中

trans-unit.source: in the layout XML
trans-unit.target: 在布局XML中

trans-unit.source: A simpler solution exists. Set these attributes in your parent layout:
trans-unit.target: 有一个更简单的解决方案。在你的父版图中设置这些属性。

trans-unit.source: Add android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysHidden" in the activity tag of the Manifest.xml file.
trans-unit.target: 在 Manifest.xml 文件的活动标记中添加 android:windowSoftInputMode="stateAlwaysHidden" 。

trans-unit.source: Add following in onCreate method:
trans-unit.target: 在 onCreate 方法中添加以下内容：

trans-unit.source: Also, we can remove focus from child views at runtime (e.g., after finishing child editing) by giving the focus to the main layout again, like this:
trans-unit.target: 另外,我们可以在运行时(例如,在完成子视图的编辑后),将焦点再次交给主布局,像这样,我们可以将焦点从子视图中移除,就像这样。

trans-unit.source: And if you want to divert the focus to another element, use requestFocus() on that. For example,
trans-unit.target: 如果要将焦点转移到另一个元素，请在该元素上使用 requestFocus() 。 例如，

trans-unit.source: And now, when the activity starts this main layout will get focus by default.
trans-unit.target: 而现在,当活动开始后,这个主布局会默认得到关注。

trans-unit.source: And the EditText won't get the focus after starting the activity
trans-unit.target: 活动开始后， EditText 将无法获得焦点

trans-unit.source: At onCreate of your Activity, just add use clearFocus() on your EditText element. For example,
trans-unit.target: 在Activity的 onCreate 上，只需在EditText元素上添加use clearFocus() 。 例如，

trans-unit.source: Basicly, hide the edit text and then show it again. This works for me as the EditText is not in view so it doesn't matter whether it is showing.
trans-unit.target: 基本上，隐藏编辑文本，然后再次显示它。 这对我有用，因为EditText 不在视图中，因此无论是否显示都没有关系。

trans-unit.source: Because you are returning false, i.e. not consuming the event, the focusing behavior will proceed like normal.
trans-unit.target: 因为你返回的是假的,也就是没有消耗事件,所以聚焦行为会像正常情况下进行。

trans-unit.source: Being that I don't like to pollute the XML with something that is related to functionality, I created this method that "transparently" steals the focus from the first focusable view and then makes sure to remove itself when necessary!
trans-unit.target: 由于我不喜欢用一些与功能相关的东西污染XML,所以我创建了这个方法,它可以 "透明地 "从第一个可聚焦的视图中偷取焦点,然后在必要时确保移除自己的焦点

trans-unit.source: Create a LinearLayout (I dunno if other kinds of Layout's will work)
trans-unit.target: 创建一个LinearLayout （如果其他类型的Layout可以工作，我不知道）

trans-unit.source: Excellent answers from Luc and Mark however a good code sample is missing. Adding the tag android:focusableInTouchMode="true" to <LinearLayout> like the following example will fix the problem.
trans-unit.target: 来自Luc和Mark的出色答案，但是缺少一个好的代码示例。 像以下示例一样，将标签 android:focusableInTouchMode="true" 到 <LinearLayout> 可以解决此问题。

trans-unit.source: For me, what worked on all devices is this:
trans-unit.target: 对我来说,在所有设备上起作用的是这样的。

trans-unit.source: How to stop EditText from gaining focus at Activity startup in Android
trans-unit.target: 如何在Android中阻止EditText在Activity启动时获得关注度?

trans-unit.source: I had tried several answers individually but the focus is still at the EditText. I only managed to solve it by using two of the below solution together.
trans-unit.target: 我单独试了好几个答案,但重点还是在EditText上。我只用下面的两个方案一起解决,才勉强解决了。

trans-unit.source: I have an Activity in Android, with two elements:
trans-unit.target: 我在Android中有一个 Activity ，其中包含两个元素：

trans-unit.source: I know this question has been answered but just providing an alternative solution that worked for me :)
trans-unit.target: 我知道这个问题已经有人回答了,但我只是提供了一个对我有效的替代性解决方案:)

trans-unit.source: I needed to clear focus from all fields programmatically. I just added the following two statements to my main layout definition.
trans-unit.target: 我需要用程序化的方式来清除所有字段的焦点。我只是在我的主布局定义中添加了以下两条语句。

trans-unit.source: I use the following code to stop an EditText from stealing the focus when my button is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 我使用下面的代码来阻止EditText在我的按钮被按下时窃取焦点。

trans-unit.source: If it's the problem of the virtual keyboard, see the AndroidManifest.xml<activity> element documentation.
trans-unit.target: 如果是虚拟键盘的问题，请参阅 AndroidManifest.xml <activity>元素文档。

trans-unit.source: If you have another view on your activity like a ListView, you can also do:
trans-unit.target: 如果您对活动有另一个视图（如 ListView ) ，则还可以执行以下操作：

trans-unit.source: Is the actual problem that you just don't want it to have focus at all? Or you don't want it to show the virtual keyboard as a result of focusing the EditText? I don't really see an issue with the EditText having focus on start, but it's definitely a problem to have the softInput window open when the user did not explicitly request to focus on the EditText (and open the keyboard as a result).
trans-unit.target: 您是否真的不希望集中精力于实际问题？ 或者您不希望由于聚焦 EditText 而显示虚拟键盘？ 我确实没有看到 EditText 专注于开始的问题，但是当用户没有明确要求专注于 EditText （并因此打开键盘）时，打开softInput窗口绝对是一个问题。

trans-unit.source: Just put this as a view before the problematic focused view, and that's it.
trans-unit.target: 只要把这个作为一个视图放在有问题的焦点视图之前,就可以了。

trans-unit.source: Late but simplest answer, just add this in parent layout of the XML.
trans-unit.target: 迟了但最简单的答案,只要在XML的父版图中加上这个就可以了。

trans-unit.source: Late, but maybe helpful. Create a dummy EditText at the top of your layout then call myDummyEditText.requestFocus() in onCreate()
trans-unit.target: 迟了，但可能有帮助。 在布局的顶部创建一个虚拟EditText，然后在 onCreate() 中调用 myDummyEditText.requestFocus() （）

trans-unit.source: Make sure to remove this line at the end of the declaration within the EditText XML tags:
trans-unit.target: 确保在 EditText XML标记内的声明末尾删除此行：

trans-unit.target: 载体文件。

trans-unit.source: No luck. How can I convince the EditText to not select itself when the Activity starts?
trans-unit.target: 没运气。 当 Activity 开始时，如何说服 EditText 不要选择自身？

trans-unit.source: None of this solutions worked for me. The way I fix the autofocus was:
trans-unit.target: 这些方案对我来说都不奏效。我修复自动对焦的方法是。

trans-unit.source: Really, we can see that the beforeDescendants set as default in the ViewGroup.initViewGroup() method (Android 2.2.2). But not equal to 0. ViewGroup.FOCUS_BEFORE_DESCENDANTS = 0x20000;
trans-unit.target: 确实，我们可以看到在 ViewGroup.initViewGroup() 方法（Android 2.2.2）中将 beforeDescendants 设置为默认值。 但不等于 ViewGroup.FOCUS_BEFORE_DESCENDANTS = 0x20000;

trans-unit.source: Set the attributes android:focusable="true" and android:focusableInTouchMode="true"
trans-unit.target: 设置属性 android:focusable="true" 和 android:focusableInTouchMode="true"

trans-unit.source: Simple solution: In AndroidManifest in Activity tag use
trans-unit.target: 简单的解决方案：在 AndroidManifest 中使用 Activity 标签

trans-unit.source: The problem seems to come from a property that I can only see in the XML form of the layout.
trans-unit.target: 问题似乎来自只能在布局的 XML form 中看到的属性。

trans-unit.source: The simplest thing I did is to set focus on another view in onCreate:
trans-unit.target: 我做的最简单的事情就是在onCreate中设置了另一个视图的焦点。

trans-unit.source: This is the perfect and most easiest solution.I always use this in my app.
trans-unit.target: 这是最完美也是最简单的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: This stopped the soft keyboard coming up and there was no cursor flashing in the EditText.
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,软键盘就停止了,EditText中没有光标闪烁。

trans-unit.source: Try clearFocus() instead of setSelected(false). Every view in Android has both focusability and selectability, and I think that you want to just clear the focus.
trans-unit.target: 尝试使用clearFocus（）而不是 setSelected(false) 。 Android中的每个视图都具有可聚焦性和可选择性，我认为您只想清除焦点。

trans-unit.source: Try this before your first editable field:
trans-unit.target: 在你的第一个可编辑字段之前,请尝试一下这个。

trans-unit.source: Upvote if it helped you ! Happy Coding :)
trans-unit.target: 如果对你有帮助,请投上票! 祝你编码快乐 :)

trans-unit.source: When my Activity starts, the EditText immediately has input focus (flashing cursor). I don't want any control to have input focus at startup. I tried:
trans-unit.target: 当我的 Activity 开始时， EditText 立即具有输入焦点（光标闪烁）。 我不希望任何控件在启动时就将焦点放在输入上。 我试过了：

trans-unit.source: Write this code inside Manifest file in the Activity where you do not want to open the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: 将此代码写在不想打开键盘的“ Activity Manifest 中的清单文件中。

trans-unit.source: Write this line in your Parent Layout...
trans-unit.target: 在你的母版图中写下这一行.....

trans-unit.source: Yeah I did the same thing - create a 'dummy' linear layout which gets initial focus. Furthermore, I set the 'next' focus IDs so the user can't focus it any more after scrolling once:
trans-unit.target: 是的,我也做了同样的事情--创建了一个 "假的 "线性布局,它可以获得初始聚焦。此外,我还设置了 "下一个 "焦点ID,这样用户在滚动一次后就不能再聚焦了。

trans-unit.source: You can just set "focusable" and "focusable in touch mode" to value true on the first TextView of the layout. In this way when the activity starts the TextView will be focused but , due to its nature, you will see nothing focused on the screen and ,of course, there will be no keyboard displayed...
trans-unit.target: 您只需在 layout 的第一个 TextView 上将“ focusable”和“在触摸模式下 可聚焦”设置为true即可。 这样，当活动开始时， TextView 将被聚焦，但是由于其性质，您将看不到任何聚焦在屏幕上的东西，当然，也不会显示键盘...

trans-unit.source: You could try hiding and showing it in succession to see if that helps it lose focus.
trans-unit.target: 你可以尝试隐藏和连续显示,看看是否有助于它失去焦点。

trans-unit.source: a lot of work just to get rid of focus on a view..
trans-unit.target: 忙得不亦乐乎,只为把焦点放在一个观点上。

trans-unit.source: and remove
trans-unit.target: 并除去

trans-unit.source: at EditText
trans-unit.target: 在EditText

trans-unit.source: in your onResume() to grab focus from the editText.
trans-unit.target: 在您的 onResume() 中以从 editText 获取焦点。

trans-unit.source: or android:windowSoftInputMode="stateUnchanged" - don't change it (e.g. don't show it if it isn't already shown, but if it was open when entering the activity, leave it open).
trans-unit.target: 或 android:windowSoftInputMode="stateUnchanged" -请勿更改（例如，如果尚未显示，则不显示它，但如果在进入活动时已打开，则将其保持打开状态）。

trans-unit.source: using the information provided by other posters, I used the following solution:
trans-unit.target: 利用其他发帖人提供的信息,我采用了以下解决方案:
